ygData.subject: Dark Age of Camelot
ygData.msgSnippet: Hate to see another good bard go, but wish you the best Elfson! I followed a link off Lum s site to Dark Age of Camelot. I think they are starting closed Beta
ygData.messageBody:
Hate to see another good bard go, but wish you the best Elfson!

I followed a link off Lum's site to Dark Age of Camelot. I think they are
starting closed Beta 2 with release scheduled for next summer. It sounded
like a great game IF they can keep the system from being abused. I did read
something this week about them having to do some redesign of the rules due
to Iron Crown (?) folding. All this is off the top of my head though so
don't take it as gospel. Go check out the FAQ.
http://camelot.xrgaming.net/index.php3?content=faq
http://www.darkageofcamelot.com/

Brilinnia Ban'sidhe (currently playing unpack, paint, and hang curtains)
Excalibur, Xegony
